import React from 'react' import { useContext } from 'react' import { ShopContext } from '../context/ShopContext' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import Breadcrumb from '../components/Breadcrumbs/Breadcrumb' import RecipeDisplay from '../components/RecipeDisplay/RecipeDisplay' import IngredientsBox from '../components/IngredientsBox/IngredientsBox' import RelatedProducts from '../components/RelatedProducts/RelatedProducts' const Recipe = () => { const {all_recipes}= useContext(ShopContext); console.log(all_recipes) return ( <> )}/*const {recipeId}=useParams(); const recipe = all_recipes.find((e)=> e.id === Number(recipeId));
*/ export default Recipe
